content: Cloudy Mist is the first enemy you will encounter in this fight. Cloudy Mist has a large staff that deals ice damage and creates thin laser beams of light that track you around the arena. He can also summon white balls of ice that follow and bombard you if you get caught in their path.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Misty_Cloud,_Cloudy_Mist_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Misty Cloud, Cloudy Mist Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Misty Cloud, Cloudy Mist Fight'.
The content is as follows:
Cloudy Mist is the first enemy you will encounter in this fight. Cloudy Mist has a large staff that deals ice damage and creates thin laser beams of light that track you around the arena. He can also summon white balls of ice that follow and bombard you if you get caught in their path.
